meanings.definition: A portable platform on which goods can be stacked, stored, and transported.
meanings.sent1: The workers loaded the heavy boxes onto the pallet.
meanings.sent2: The warehouse uses pallets to organize and move products efficiently.
meanings.sent3: When the pallet started rolling downhill, it became a wild ride for the workers!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a pallet, neatly stacking memories for safekeeping.
meanings.sent5: The bright red pallet stood out among the sea of wooden platforms.

meanings.sent1: The old barn had a cozy pallet for the tired farmhand.
meanings.sent2: She slept soundly on the soft pallet in the attic.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat thought the straw pallet was a new playground.
meanings.sent4: His dreams floated on the straw pallet like clouds in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The rustic pallet smelled of earth and comfort, lulling him to sleep.
